name: AddProblemNote
description:
Create a new note on a problem in Freshservice.

Use this tool to add a detailed note to an existing problem in Freshservice, providing additional context or updates.

parameters.name: problem_id
parameters.description: The ID of the problem to which the note will be added. This identifies the specific problem in Freshservice.

value_schema.description: ID of problem for which notes are to be retrieved

parameters.name: note_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the note to be created or referenced.

parameters.name: creator_user_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the user who created the note.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notification_emails
parameters.description: List of email addresses to notify about the note creation. Each email should be a string.

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: note_html_body
parameters.description: The content of the note formatted in HTML.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: note_body_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format, providing details or updates about the problem.

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: note_creation_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time when the note was initially created. Use the format 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: note_updated_datetime
parameters.description: The date and time when the note was last updated, in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: problem_id
parameters.description: ID of problem for which notes are to be retrieved

value_schema.description: ID of problem for which notes are to be retrieved

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

parameters.name: notify_emails
parameters.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

value_schema.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The body of the note in HTML format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in HTML format

parameters.name: body_text
parameters.description: The body of the note in plain text format

value_schema.description: The body of the note in plain text format

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was created

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Date time at which the note was updated

value_schema.description: Date time at which the note was updated
